definition: Jade Emperor Peak on Mt Tai in Shandong

sentences.english: The Jade Emperor asked the Earth God to inform all the animals about this news.
sentences.chinese: 玉皇大帝就通知土地公去公布一个消息。

sentences.english: One legend features the Jade Emperor, also known as the Emperor of Heaven.
sentences.chinese: 有一个传说的主角是玉皇大帝，又称元始天尊。

sentences.english: At that moment, the Jade Emperor flew past on a turbulent cloud, waving his arms.
sentences.chinese: 在那时，玉皇大帝挥舞著双手，乘著一片乱云飞过。

sentences.english: South Yuhuangding peak, known for impressive sunrise.
sentences.chinese: 峰南玉皇顶，因可观日出而闻名。

sentences.english: In spite of severe damage, the overall structure of Yuhuangge is in good shape.
sentences.chinese: 尽管受到严重破坏，但玉皇阁的整体结构却保持良好。

sentences.english: Yuhuangding, Mount Tai's highest peak, stands over deep valleys and above other perilous peaks.
sentences.chinese: 其巅峰玉皇顶为峡谷和险峰所环绕。

sentences.english: Jade Emperor decreed to hold a competition.
sentences.chinese: 于是，玉皇大帝决定举行一场比赛。

sentences.english: The legend goes that Wang was a warrior of Emperor Yuhuang guarding Lingxiao Palace.
sentences.chinese: 传说王灵官原为玉皇大帝凌霄宝殿前的一名武士。

sentences.english: The Jade Emperor, the highest god in Heaven, vowed to avenge the swan.
sentences.chinese: 天界最高神玉皇大帝因此发誓为天鹅报仇。

sentences.english: The condition of tourism of development in Yuhuang mountain was surveyed.
sentences.chinese: 调查了玉皇山景区的基本条件。

sentences.english: Do good deeds to earn the blessings of the Jade Emperor.
sentences.chinese: 行善积德，自有玉皇大帝保佑。

sentences.english: Two temples are independent quadrangle jade emperor hall is the type of gate tower wei type grand sight.
sentences.chinese: 两寺均为独立的四合院，玉皇殿为城楼式，蔚式壮观。

definition: Laozi or Lao-tze (c. 500 BC), Chinese philosopher, the founder of Taoism/the sacred book of Daoism, 道德經|道德经 by Laozi
Temple in Heaven (e.g. of the Jade Emperor)
Lord of profound heaven, major Daoist deity/aka Black Tortoise 玄武 or Black heavenly emperor 玄天上帝
time immemorial/origin of the universe/the world
the Jade lake on Mount Kunlun, residence of Xi Wangmu 西王母
another name for 西王母[Xi1 wang2 mu3], Queen Mother of the West
great emptiness/the void/heaven/the skies/universe/cosmos/original essence of the cosmos
underground palace of ghouls, e.g. Asgard of Scandinavian mythology
lower bound (math.)/world of mortals/(of Gods) to descend to the world of mortals
